title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Skills: Ubiquitous Computing-Based Language Education Simulation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply context-specific language expressions in a ubiquitous computing environment (VR/simulation) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners collaboratively build knowledge by sharing language problem-solving strategies with peers at least three times using inquiry-based learning methodologies.
Learners establish self-directed learning plans using digital tools, achieving a completion rate of over 90% by the end of the course.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
